summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp Business CRM application. Backend APIs working excellently (96.4% success rate), frontend has navigation issues and JavaScript errors that need attention.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects query parameter instead of JSON body for product recommendations

critical_bugs.issue: Navigation links not working properly - timeout errors when navigating between pages

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime error: Select.Item must have a value prop that is not an empty string
Multiple React runtime errors in bundle.js affecting component rendering

integration_issues.issue: Navigation between pages (Leads, Inventory, Settings) failing with timeouts

passed_tests: Lead CRUD Operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Lead Filtering by Stage and Classification
Gimmicks Theme Implementation (Dark background, emerald buttons, white cards)

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (Login and Dashboard working, Navigation and forms have issues)

critical_fixes_needed: Fix JavaScript runtime errors in Select components - ensure all SelectItem components have non-empty value props
Fix navigation system - sidebar links not properly routing to pages
Debug React Fiber errors in bundle.js that are affecting component rendering
Fix AI product recommendations endpoint to accept JSON body instead of query parameters
testing_notes: Backend APIs are working excellently with comprehensive CRUD operations
Authentication and dashboard functionality working perfectly
Gimmicks theme implementation is correct (dark background #09090b, emerald accents, white cards)
WhatsApp Business API webhook is MOCKED as expected
AI integration with GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM is functional for message analysis
